thread.title: Watch Nancy Pelosi take questions as critical House vote to avoid shutdown looms

title: Watch Nancy Pelosi take questions as critical House vote to avoid shutdown looms
text:
Watch Nancy Pelosi take questions as critical House vote to avoid shutdown looms 35 Mins Ago CNBC.com If you are experiencing issues watching this video, tap here to view it in your browser. SHARES 
[ The stream is slated to start at 10:45 a.m. ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time. ] 
House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi takes questions Thursday as Congress barrels toward a government shutdown this weekend. 
Lawmakers will need to pass a spending bill by the end of Friday to extend funding for agencies. House Republicans hope to pass a bill Thursday that would fund the government through Feb. 16, reauthorize the popular Children's Health Insurance Program for six years, and delay some Affordable Care Act taxes. 
Some Democrats have threatened to vote against the stopgap bill if they cannot also pass a plan to protect hundreds of thousands of young undocumented immigrants from deportation. CNBC NEWSLETTERS
